mapper.select: SELECT info_id, user_id, name, school_class, sex, grade, specialty, college, specialty_direction, user_name FROM `student_info` LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = student_info.user_id where sys_user.status = 0

SELECT info_id, user_id, name, school_class, sex, grade, specialty, college, specialty_direction, user_name FROM `student_info` LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = student_info.user_id WHERE `status` = 0 and user_id = #{userId}

SELECT info_id, student_info.user_id, name, school_class, sex, grade, specialty, college, specialty_direction, user_name FROM `student_test` LEFT JOIN student_info ON student_test.user_id = student_info.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = student_info.user_id WHERE student_test.test_id = #{id} and sys_user.status = 0
